name: White Man - The Most Haunt & Horror Game
name_original: White Man - The Most Haunt & Horror Game
description:
“HE SAID he had never seen a White man's ghost and I told him he was lucky; that a White man's ghost is very bad business. His eyes widened.”

White man is depicted as being unnaturally tall, he can adjust the length of.

He has the need to kill people, and his limbs are said to hypnotize them, making them unable to stop themselves from walking into them.

The more you know about him, the closer it gets.
